input_text:
Job Title: Manfacturing Engineer Intern - Electronics

Location: Glendale Heights, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Manufacturing/Process Engineer Intern
About usSurya Electronics is a rapidly growing, PC Board Contract Assembly business in Glendale Heights, IL. Established in 1983, we are professional, customer-centric, and fast-paced and our goal is to pay fairly for hard working, intelligent individuals in a rewarding and friendly environment. We are minority owned and focused on developing the next generation. 
Our work environment includes:Casual work attireOn-the-job trainingSafe work environmentWe are looking for a Manufacturing Engineering or Electrical Engineering Intern to work closely with Senior Engineering to develop the product engineering files, design for manufacture, and create work processes and instructions. As part of the training, a candidate will develop skills to review and approve assembly files, customer designs, develop work instructions to meet ISO 9001:2015 standards and source purchased components. The candidate will also gain experience with customer service, supplier selection, and operations. 
We are looking for a motivated, enthusiastic and flexible person to join our team, with a mind for Continuous Improvement. The candidate should have a good eye for detail, and have good organizational skills. The successful candidate will have the ability to work independently and efficiently, as well as the ability to follow instructions closely.   Daily Responsibilities:Assist Senior Engineers with the design review and release of customer designs;Develop BOMâ€™s and verify component availability; Identify alternative components and suppliers; Create work instructions;Complete Continuous Improvement Projects;Data Entry into the ERP software;Coach operators on proper manufacturing processes and techniques.Additional Responsibilities:Participate in Lean and QMS improvement committees; Participate and potentially lead 5S and work station layout projectsData EntryDesired Experience and Skills:Degree path towards a degree in computer science, electrical engineering or engineering technology, electronics technology or circuit design;Experience with Circuits; Microsoft Office proficiency. (Requirement);General computer literacy; Demonstrable problem solving skills; The ideal candidate will be curious, flexible, creative and team orientated. Job Type: Flexible, on site (20 to 40 hours)Working Hours: 7:00 AM - 3:30 PMSalary: $16.50 / Hour
Ability to commute/relocate:Glendale Heights, IL 60139: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required)Language:English (Required)Work Location: In person

Experience Level (if available): None

Develop Bill of Materials (BOM) and verify component availability
Coach operators on proper manufacturing processes and techniques
Participate in Lean and Quality Management System (QMS) improvement committees
Participate and potentially lead 5S and work station layout projects

Established in 1983, they are professional, customer-centric, and fast-paced, aiming to pay fairly for hard-working, intelligent individuals in a rewarding and friendly environment. They are minority-owned and focused on developing the next generation.

Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required)
